original: bha ba sanytsar n'a ma /

translated: Bhava-samcara-nama

original: bod skad du /🔽dngos po sbyong ba zhes bya ba //
analyzed: bod skad du / dngos po sbyong ba zhes bya ba //
translated: In Tibetan:🔽Dngos po sbyong ba zhes bya ba

original: sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Buddha.

original: dngos po med la dngos por shis //
analyzed: dngos po med la dngos por shis //
translated: Non-entity is known as entity.

original: dngos med skye ba yod ma yin //
analyzed: dngos med skye ba yod ma yin //
translated: Non-entity does not arise.

original: rtag tu skye ba dngos po nyid //
analyzed: rtag tu skye ba dngos po nyid //
translated: Arising is always entity itself.

original: dngos 'khrul nam mkha'i me tog bzhin //
analyzed: dngos 'khrul nam mkha'i me tog bzhin //
translated: Entity is confused like a sky flower.

original: mkha' dang mnyam pa'i chos rnams ni //
analyzed: mkha' dang mnyam pa'i chos rnams ni //
translated: Dharmas equal to space🔽Are supreme in the equality of space.

original: skye ba mkha' dang mnyam nyid mchog / thams cad rang bzhin gyis mkha' mnyam //
analyzed: skye ba mkha' dang mnyam nyid mchog / thams cad rang bzhin gyis mkha' mnyam //
translated: All are naturally equal to space.

original: des na srid ba dam pa'i dngos //
analyzed: des na srid ba dam pa'i dngos //
translated: Therefore, existence is the supreme entity.

original: rgyu med 'bras bu med pa ste //
analyzed: rgyu med 'bras bu med pa ste //
translated: There is no cause, no effect.

original: las kyi rang bzhin yod ma yin //
analyzed: las kyi rang bzhin yod ma yin //
translated: The nature of karma does not exist.

original: 'jig rten pa med 'jig rten med //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa med 'jig rten med //
translated: There is no world, no non-world.

original: 'di dag thams cad bden ma yin //
analyzed: 'di dag thams cad bden ma yin //
translated: All of this is not true.

original: ma skyes pas ni dngos po gang //
analyzed: ma skyes pas ni dngos po gang //
translated: How can a non-arisen entity

original: ji ltar gzhan las shes bar 'gyur //
analyzed: ji ltar gzhan las shes bar 'gyur //
translated: Be known from another?

original: mo gsham gyi ni bu nyid kyang //
analyzed: mo gsham gyi ni bu nyid kyang //
translated: Even the son of a barren woman

original: de tshe skye bar 'gyur ma yin //
analyzed: de tshe skye bar 'gyur ma yin //
translated: At that time does not arise.

original: 'jig rten gzod nas ma skyes te //
analyzed: 'jig rten gzod nas ma skyes te //
translated: The world has never arisen.

original: gang gis kyang ni sprul ma yin //
analyzed: gang gis kyang ni sprul ma yin //
translated: It is not created by anyone.

original: don med 'khrul pa'i 'jig rten 'di //
analyzed: don med 'khrul pa'i 'jig rten 'di //
translated: This meaningless, deluded world

original: zla ba bzang po'i grong khyer bzhin //
analyzed: zla ba bzang po'i grong khyer bzhin //
translated: is like the city of the gandharvas.

original: 'jig rten rnam par rtog las 'byung //
analyzed: 'jig rten rnam par rtog las 'byung //
translated: The world arises from conceptualization.

original: rnam rtog sems las byung ba ste //
analyzed: rnam rtog sems las byung ba ste //
translated: Conceptualization arises from the mind.

original: gang phyir lus las sems byung bas //
analyzed: gang phyir lus las sems byung bas //
translated: Since the mind arises from the body,🔽therefore, the body is investigated.

original: de phyir lus la rnam par brtag / gzugs stong tshor ba rang bzhin med //🔽'du shes med cing 'du byed med //
analyzed: de phyir lus la rnam par brtag / gzugs stong tshor ba rang bzhin med // 'du shes med cing 'du byed med //
translated: Form is empty, feeling has no intrinsic nature,🔽perception does not exist, volitions do not exist,

original: sems byung med cing dngos po med //
analyzed: sems byung med cing dngos po med //
translated: consciousness does not arise, entities do not exist,

original: de phyir mi rtog rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de phyir mi rtog rang bzhin no //
translated: therefore, the nature is non-conceptual.

original: des na sems min chos kyang min //
analyzed: des na sems min chos kyang min //
translated: Therefore, it is not the mind, nor is it phenomena,

original: lus min khams la sogs pa min //
analyzed: lus min khams la sogs pa min //
translated: it is not the body, nor is it the elements and so forth.

original: gnyis su med pa'i lam 'di ni //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i lam 'di ni //
translated: This non-dual path

original: de nyid rig pa rnams kyis gsungs //
analyzed: de nyid rig pa rnams kyis gsungs //
translated: is taught by those who know reality.

original: dmigs pa med pa'i chos 'di kun //
analyzed: dmigs pa med pa'i chos 'di kun //
translated: All these phenomena without reference

original: dmigs pa med par rab tu bstan //
analyzed: dmigs pa med par rab tu bstan //
translated: are fully taught to be without reference.

original: dmigs pa med pa'i blo byas na //
analyzed: dmigs pa med pa'i blo byas na //
translated: When the mind is made without reference,

original: dmigs pa med par 'gyur ba yin //
analyzed: dmigs pa med par 'gyur ba yin //
translated: it becomes without reference.

original: sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus //
analyzed: sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus //
translated: Generosity, morality, patience, and diligence,

original: bsam gtan las byung bsten par bya //
analyzed: bsam gtan las byung bsten par bya //
translated: And those that arise from concentration.

original: dus mi ring ba nyid na ni //
analyzed: dus mi ring ba nyid na ni //
translated: Before long,

original: bla med byang chub thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: bla med byang chub thob par 'gyur //
translated: One will attain unsurpassed enlightenment.

original: shes rab thabs la gnas gyur pas //
analyzed: shes rab thabs la gnas gyur pas //
translated: Abiding in wisdom and means,

original: sems can kun la brtse bar bya //
analyzed: sems can kun la brtse bar bya //
translated: One should have compassion for all sentient beings.🔽The supreme state of omniscience

original: @128a * // thams cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang mchog / lha nyid dus mi ring bar 'thob //
analyzed: @128a * // thams cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang mchog / lha nyid dus mi ring bar 'thob //
translated: Will be attained before long.

original: 'di dag thams cad ming tsam ste //
analyzed: 'di dag thams cad ming tsam ste //
translated: All of these are mere names,🔽Fully engaged in mere conventions.

original: tha snyad tsam du rab tu 'jug / dngos po med la tha dad pa'i //
analyzed: tha snyad tsam du rab tu 'jug / dngos po med la tha dad pa'i //
translated: In the absence of entities,

original: brjod bya yod pa ma yin te //🔽bdag nyid gang dang gang gis ni //
analyzed: brjod bya yod pa ma yin te // bdag nyid gang dang gang gis ni //
translated: The expressed meaning does not exist.🔽Whatever is imputed

original: chos rnams gang dang gang brtags pa //
analyzed: chos rnams gang dang gang brtags pa //
translated: By whatever means

original: de ni de la yod min te //
analyzed: de ni de la yod min te //
translated: Does not exist in that [imputed object].

original: chos rnams kyi ni chos nyid de //
analyzed: chos rnams kyi ni chos nyid de //
translated: That is the intrinsic nature of phenomena.

original: ming gis ming nyid stong pas na //
analyzed: ming gis ming nyid stong pas na //
translated: Since name is empty of name,

original: ming la ming ni yod ma yin //
analyzed: ming la ming ni yod ma yin //
translated: Name does not exist in name.

original: chos rnams thams cad ming med pas //
analyzed: chos rnams thams cad ming med pas //
translated: Since all phenomena are nameless,

original: ming ni btags pa tsam nyid do //
analyzed: ming ni btags pa tsam nyid do //
translated: Name is mere imputation.

original: mi bden par gyur chos 'di dag / brtags pa nyid du rab tu 'jug / gang la brtags pa de med na //
analyzed: mi bden par gyur chos 'di dag / brtags pa nyid du rab tu 'jug / gang la brtags pa de med na //
translated: When that which is imputed does not exist,

original: stong pa nyid du brtags pa gang //
analyzed: stong pa nyid du brtags pa gang //
translated: it is imputed as emptiness.

original: mig gis mthong ba'i gzugs rnams ni //
analyzed: mig gis mthong ba'i gzugs rnams ni //
translated: The forms seen by the eye

original: de nyid rig pa zhes de bshad //
analyzed: de nyid rig pa zhes de bshad //
translated: are explained as mere awareness of that.

original: 'jig rten log pa'i nga rgyal can //
analyzed: 'jig rten log pa'i nga rgyal can //
translated: Those in the world who have false pride🔽are here posited as conventional truths.

original: kun rdzob bden pa zhes 'dir 'jog / gang du tshogs pa'i rkyen mthong ba //
analyzed: kun rdzob bden pa zhes 'dir 'jog / gang du tshogs pa'i rkyen mthong ba //
translated: Where the conditions of the assembly are seen,

original: 'dren pa gsal bar gyur pa yin //🔽blo dang ldan pas don dam la //
analyzed: 'dren pa gsal bar gyur pa yin // blo dang ldan pas don dam la //
translated: the guide becomes clear.🔽The wise one,

original: brtags te grags pa nges par mthong //
analyzed: brtags te grags pa nges par mthong //
translated: having examined the ultimate, definitely sees what is renowned.

original: gzugs ni mig gis mi mthong zhing //
analyzed: gzugs ni mig gis mi mthong zhing //
translated: Form is not seen by the eye,

original: yid kyis chos rnams mi rig pa ;
analyzed: yid kyis chos rnams mi rig pa ;
translated: and the mind does not cognize phenomena.

original: ;'di ni mchog tu bden pa ste //
analyzed: ;'di ni mchog tu bden pa ste //
translated: This is the supreme truth,

original: 'jig rten gang gis kyang mi shes //
analyzed: 'jig rten gang gis kyang mi shes //
translated: but it is not known by anyone in the world.

analyzed: dngos po sbyong ba zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
